function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Imbalance between supply and demand in thermal environment control","Impact":"Uncomfortable thermal conditions for building occupants","Mitigation":"Implementing building management strategies to balance thermal supply and demand","Technologies":"Building energy management systems, occupancy sensors","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building operators"},{"Description":"Overheating in the cold zone during winter","Impact":"Discomfort and potential health risks for occupants","Mitigation":"Optimizing HVAC system controls to prevent overheating","Technologies":"Smart HVAC controllers, temperature monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building operators"},{"Description":"Insufficient heating in the HSCW zone during winter","Impact":"Discomfort and potential health risks for occupants","Mitigation":"Upgrading heating systems and implementing zoning controls","Technologies":"Zoned heating systems, smart thermostats","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building operators"}]}
